component.name: Personal History Timeline
component.summary: Manage those special memories and events that form the tapestry of your life

description.p: Personal History Timeline is a desktop application designed for families who want an easy-to-use software tool to capture, manage and recall special events and memories that occur over the course of their lives together.

ul.li: Complete add/update/delete support for event management
Bulk data entry, batch processing and duplicate removal tools
Light and Dark theme support with accent colors for personalization
Includes a robust test database with 1,000 sample records

description.p: This is trial software by Robert Bascom dba parsemonkey. This version provides a 21-day evaluation period for testing and evaluation purposes. After the trial period, a one-time license fee of $38 is required for continued use.
Built with Python3, SQLite, and PySide6 for Linux systems.
Initial release with comprehensive timeline management features.

ul.li: Complete timeline application with CRUD support
Data management tools including search and batch processing
